subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Horseplayers and horse lovers alike have been waiting ardently for over 30 years for another horse to win the Triple Crown. Will Super Saver be the one?
